text.en: Hello there! Please select your preffered language:
Language set to English Now, choose how you'd like to set up your news:
Manual Entry Great! Select the type of news feed you'd like to set up:
RSS Feeds Send me a list of RSS/Atom links you'd like to follow - each on its own line. Here's an example
Channels Send me a list of usenames of telegram channels you'd like to follow - each on its own line. Here's an example
Explore Great! Send me a list of topics you'd like to see in your news feeds with a simple list of of words or phrases, each separated by a comma. For example: US News, Astronomy, Telegram

text2.en: Suggestions for channels and RSS feeds to follow have been compiled. Select which ones you'd like to follow by clicking the buttons below:
